channel.title: Two and a Half Men on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Two and a Half Men on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Jon Cryer Says ‘I Got a Third’ of Charlie Sheen’s Pay on ‘Two and a Half Men’: People ‘Were So Scared of Him That They Would Shovel Money at Him’
item.description: Jon Cryer reveals in Netflix’s “aka Charlie Sheen” that his “Two and a Half Men” payday was “a third” of co-star Charlie Sheen’s despite the latter&#821

item.title: Jon Cryer Says ‘I Got a Third’ of Charlie Sheen’s Pay on ‘Two and a Half Men’: People ‘Were So Scared of Him That They Would Shovel Money at Him’
item.description: Jon Cryer reveals in Netflix’s “aka Charlie Sheen” that his “Two and a Half Men” payday was “a third” of co-star Charlie Sheen’s despite the latter&#821

item.title: ‘aka Charlie Sheen’ Review: Netflix Doc Offers a Reflective but Exhausting Look at the Actor’s Stardom and Notoriety
item.description: Andrew Renzi’s two-part docuseries features Jon Cryer, Chuck Lorre, Denise Richards, Sean Penn and many more friends and loved ones.
